amendment.description: To require the Secretary of the Air Force to prepare an environmental impact statement or similar analysis for the beddown of F-22A fighter aircraft at Holloman Air Force Base, New Mexico, as replacements for retiring F-117A fighter aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4449 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4449 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6389) To require the Secretary of the Air Force to prepare an environmental impact statement or similar analysis for the beddown of F-22A fighter aircraft at Holloman Air Force Base, New Mexico, as replacements for retiring F-117A fighter aircraft.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4449 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4449 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici.
